Consumer Goods Innovations

Agentforce for Consumer Goods: Telesales Skills

Equip AI agents with the ability to highlight the best products at the best price instantly to maximise revenue in every call. Agents can generate pitches for the suggested products catered to the account needs.

Learn more

Agentforce for Consumer Goods: Visit Management Skills

Equip AI agents with the ability to create visits to get products to customers faster. Agents can assign products and a driver to the visit based off of driver schedule, available inventory and customer needs.

Learn more

Agentforce for Consumer Goods: Customer Service Skills

AI agents can generate account summaries that provide service reps with a comprehensive view of customer interactions including top selling products, in-store compliance insight, transaction summaries and personalised responses to sell more and serve faster.

Learn more

Data 360 for Consumer Goods: Connectors for Promotion Data

Integrate data from processing services in Hyperforce into Consumer Goods Cloud. Let humans and agents take action on relevant trade data and increase speed to insight.

Learn more

Consumer Goods Cloud: Mobile App Enhancements

Connect the Consumer Goods Cloud mobile app to other internal and external apps to exchange information and take action. Share important context between apps based to identify what data needs to be exchanged, such as customer account and its related KPIs.

Learn more

Trade Promotion Optimisation (TPO) Enhancements: Forward Buy

Accurately predict the variability of demand around a promotion caused by forward buying, also known as pantry loading. Calculate the right predicted uplift needed to ensure the customer business plan is still profitable despite this purchase behaviour.

Learn more

Salesforce for Consumer Goods FAQs

Consumer Goods CRM is a software solution that strengthens customer relationships and makes businesses more efficient. Salesforce is the world's #1 AI CRM for Consumer Goods with industry-specific solutions to activate B2B and B2C data to deliver profitable growth.

Salesforce is a robust Consumer Goods CRM solution with proven experience in unifying and activating disparate data, building brand relevancy with target consumers, driving brand growth with their retail customers and increasing efficiencies across all functions of the business.

The exact Consumer Goods technology your business needs can vary depending on how your business works. Salesforce for Consumer Goods has many solutions across B2B and B2C functions that deliver profitable growth for your business. Contact us to see what works for your business.

Salesforce is the world's #1 AI CRM for Consumer Goods. We develop solutions across B2B and B2C to deliver profitable growth. Consumer Goods Cloud is our industry specific product built on the Agentforce 360 Platform and equipped with integrated planning and execution capabilities.

Choose the right Consumer Goods technology by evaluating the needs of your business. Whether you want to accelerate account growth, increase your trade promotion effectiveness, perfect Retail execution, or grow customer satisfaction, you can pick the right capabilities for your team.

We offer a range of capabilities across the Agentforce 360 Platform. For instance, with Consumer Goods Cloud you can generate personalised playbooks with generative AI to deliver guided selling with personalised messaging that highlights unique product features.
